text:
I’m looking for someone who can help me with 2 small jobs.

I’m looking for someone who can implement the solution to this; <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM/Question-regarding-dependent-fields-within-a-form/m-p/879734>

And I’m looking for someone who can implement the solutions of this:

I’m trying to show HTML in a HubSpot email but it does not render
maybe you can help with my question i sent in the channel?

:wave: Kevin,

I have a lot of experience with creating custom email solutions as well as complex form alterations in HubSpot. I'm available if you would like to chat and show me the form and code you are trying to alter.
Sure, tell me if you still need help
